modName: HDT Hair to Hair Helmet Picture and Video Tutorial
summary:
turn hairs into helmets using nifskope.
easy peasy too
descriptionHtml:
[b]YouTube Video Tutorial by Suredude[/b]

[youtube]fR3G5rDLVRI[/youtube][b]



Simple picture tutorial to turn hair nifs into a helmet[/b]
[color=#d8d8d8]
- requires [url=http://niftools.sourceforge.net/wiki/NifSkope]Nifskope [/url]and only very basic Creation Kit knowledge (have it open and type hide in the object window filter box)
- example hair used is Icarus Hair nif in [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/70363/?]KS Hairdos - HDT Physics by Stealthic and Kalilies[/url] 
- no need to touch hair pack esp or esm as the nifs themselves contain the HDT physics data path.
- works with normal and HDT hairs
[/color]
[b]tools setup info:
[/b]
[color=#d8d8d8]- to set up Nifskope initially, Render -> Settings -> Render tab -> Add Folder -> point it to Skyrim|Data[/color]
[color=#d8d8d8]- opening the Creation Kit shows errors, this is normal - click Yes to ALL or Ignore on all popup windows[/color]

[b]preparation:[/b]

[color=#d8d8d8]- have your Main Hair and Hairline nifs both open side by side with nifskope and Creation Kit simply sitting ready to create a mod
- then go step by step through the pictures
[/color]
